document_data.name: Court scepter
document_data.mainbody: A '''court scepter''' was a scepter used in [[Cormanthor]].
document_data.Powers:
Per the [[Srinshee]], a court scepter could be used to read the powers of spells and duplicate them. However, it had limited charges.

Elminster later used the scepter to duplicate a spell cast earlier that evening rather than one as it was cast.{{cite book/Elminster in Myth Drannor|210-212|11}} The scepter could also be used to store a copy of an ongoing spell and reveal its powers.
document_data.History: The [[Srinshee]] gave one such scepter to [[Elminster Aumar]] in {{yearlink|241}} prior to his standing in for the [[Coronal]] for a revel in the [[Hallows]].{{cite book/Elminster in Myth Drannor|20-209|10}} Later that evening, he employed the scepter to determine the properties of a field during his Hunt.{{cite book/Elminster in Myth Drannor|226|11}} He spent some power from the scepter in order to power a different spell afterwards.{{cite book/Elminster in Myth Drannor|230|11}}
